data.content: Handoff capsule: added release/local channel tooling via scripts/release/channel-install.sh and scripts/release/channel-use.sh; local channel builds from current checkout and installs via local artifact URL; README and docs/DEVELOPING updated with usage/env vars. Validation: isolated /tmp E2E install + channel switch passed; quality gates passed (bun run lint [warnings only], bunx tsc --noEmit, bun run test, bun run build). Commit: a97b761.
